verses.arabic: ٱقۡتَرَبَتِ ٱلسَّاعَةُ وَٱنشَقَّ ٱلۡقَمَرُ
verses.translation: The Hour has come near, and the moon has split [in two].
verses.transliteration: Iqtarabatis Saa'atu wsan shaqqal qamar

verses.arabic: وَإِن یَرَوۡا۟ ءَایَةࣰ یُعۡرِضُوا۟ وَیَقُولُوا۟ سِحۡرࣱ مُّسۡتَمِرࣱّ
verses.translation: And if they see a miracle, they turn away and say, "Passing magic."
verses.transliteration: Wa iny yaraw aayatany yu'ridoo wa yaqooloo sihrum mustamirr

verses.arabic: وَكَذَّبُوا۟ وَٱتَّبَعُوۤا۟ أَهۡوَاۤءَهُمۡۚ وَكُلُّ أَمۡرࣲ مُّسۡتَقِرࣱّ
verses.translation: And they denied and followed their inclinations. But for every matter is a [time of] settlement.
verses.transliteration: Wa kazzaboo wattaba'ooo ahwaaa'ahum; wa kullu amrim mustaqirr

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدۡ جَاۤءَهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأَنۢبَاۤءِ مَا فِیهِ مُزۡدَجَرٌ
verses.translation: And there has already come to them of information that in which there is deterrence -
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad jaaa'ahum minal ambaaa'i maa feehi muzdajar

verses.arabic: حِكۡمَةُۢ بَـٰلِغَةࣱۖ فَمَا تُغۡنِ ٱلنُّذُرُ
verses.translation: Extensive wisdom - but warning does not avail [them].
verses.transliteration: Hikmatum baalighatun famaa tughnin nuzur

verses.arabic: فَتَوَلَّ عَنۡهُمۡۘ یَوۡمَ یَدۡعُ ٱلدَّاعِ إِلَىٰ شَیۡءࣲ نُّكُرٍ
verses.translation: So leave them, [O Muhammad]. The Day the Caller calls to something forbidding,
verses.transliteration: Fatawalla 'anhum; yawma yad'ud daa'i ilaa shai 'in nukur

verses.arabic: خُشَّعًا أَبۡصَـٰرُهُمۡ یَخۡرُجُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡأَجۡدَاثِ كَأَنَّهُمۡ جَرَادࣱ مُّنتَشِرࣱ
verses.translation: Their eyes humbled, they will emerge from the graves as if they were locusts spreading,
verses.transliteration: khushsha'an absaaruhum yakrujoona minal ajdaasi ka annahum jaraadum muntashir

verses.arabic: مُّهۡطِعِینَ إِلَى ٱلدَّاعِۖ یَقُولُ ٱلۡكَـٰفِرُونَ هَـٰذَا یَوۡمٌ عَسِرࣱ
verses.translation: Racing ahead toward the Caller. The disbelievers will say, "This is a difficult Day."
verses.transliteration: Muhti'eena ilad daa'i yaqoolul kafiroona haazaa yawmun 'asir

verses.arabic: ۞ كَذَّبَتۡ قَبۡلَهُمۡ قَوۡمُ نُوحࣲ فَكَذَّبُوا۟ عَبۡدَنَا وَقَالُوا۟ مَجۡنُونࣱ وَٱزۡدُجِرَ
verses.translation: The people of Noah denied before them, and they denied Our servant and said, "A madman," and he was repelled.
verses.transliteration: Kazzabat qablahum qawmu Noohin fakazzaboo 'abdanaa wa qaaloo majnoo nunw wazdujir

verses.arabic: فَدَعَا رَبَّهُۥۤ أَنِّی مَغۡلُوبࣱ فَٱنتَصِرۡ
verses.translation: So he invoked his Lord, "Indeed, I am overpowered, so help."
verses.transliteration: Fada'aa Rabbahooo annee maghloobun fantasir

verses.arabic: فَفَتَحۡنَاۤ أَبۡوَ ٰ⁠بَ ٱلسَّمَاۤءِ بِمَاۤءࣲ مُّنۡهَمِرࣲ
verses.translation: Then We opened the gates of the heaven with rain pouring down
verses.transliteration: Fafatahnaaa abwaabas sa maaa'i bimaa'im munhamir

verses.arabic: وَفَجَّرۡنَا ٱلۡأَرۡضَ عُیُونࣰا فَٱلۡتَقَى ٱلۡمَاۤءُ عَلَىٰۤ أَمۡرࣲ قَدۡ قُدِرَ
verses.translation: And caused the earth to burst with springs, and the waters met for a matter already predestined.
verses.transliteration: Wa fajjamal arda 'uyoonan faltaqal maaa'u 'alaaa amrin qad qudir

verses.arabic: وَحَمَلۡنَـٰهُ عَلَىٰ ذَاتِ أَلۡوَ ٰ⁠حࣲ وَدُسُرࣲ
verses.translation: And We carried him on a [construction of] planks and nails,
verses.transliteration: Wa hamalnaahu 'alaa zaati alwaahinw wa dusur

verses.arabic: تَجۡرِی بِأَعۡیُنِنَا جَزَاۤءࣰ لِّمَن كَانَ كُفِرَ
verses.translation: Sailing under Our observation as reward for he who had been denied.
verses.transliteration: Tajree bi a'yuninaa jazaaa 'al liman kaana kufir

verses.arabic: وَلَقَد تَّرَكۡنَـٰهَاۤ ءَایَةࣰ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرࣲ
verses.translation: And We left it as a sign, so is there any who will remember?
verses.transliteration: Wa laqat taraknaahaad aayatan fahal mim muddakir

verses.arabic: فَكَیۡفَ كَانَ عَذَابِی وَنُذُرِ
verses.translation: And how [severe] were My punishment and warning.
verses.transliteration: Fakaifa kaana 'azaabee wa nuzur

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدۡ یَسَّرۡنَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ لِلذِّكۡرِ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرࣲ
verses.translation: And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember?
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad yassamal Quraana liz zikri fahal mimmuddakir

verses.arabic: كَذَّبَتۡ عَادࣱ فَكَیۡفَ كَانَ عَذَابِی وَنُذُرِ
verses.translation: 'Aad denied; and how [severe] were My punishment and warning.
verses.transliteration: Kazzabat 'Aadun fakaifa kaana 'azaabee wa nuzur

verses.arabic: إِنَّاۤ أَرۡسَلۡنَا عَلَیۡهِمۡ رِیحࣰا صَرۡصَرࣰا فِی یَوۡمِ نَحۡسࣲ مُّسۡتَمِرࣲّ
verses.translation: Indeed, We sent upon them a screaming wind on a day of continuous misfortune,
verses.transliteration: Innaa arsalnaa 'alaihim reehan sarsaran fee Yawmi nahsim mustamirr

verses.arabic: تَنزِعُ ٱلنَّاسَ كَأَنَّهُمۡ أَعۡجَازُ نَخۡلࣲ مُّنقَعِرࣲ
verses.translation: Extracting the people as if they were trunks of palm trees uprooted.
verses.transliteration: Tanzi;un naasa ka anna huma'jaazu nakhlim munqa'ir

verses.arabic: فَكَیۡفَ كَانَ عَذَابِی وَنُذُرِ
verses.translation: And how [severe] were My punishment and warning.
verses.transliteration: 'Fakaifa kaana 'azaabee wa nuzur

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدۡ یَسَّرۡنَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ لِلذِّكۡرِ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرࣲ
verses.translation: And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember?
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad yassamal Quraana liz zikri fahal mim muddakir

verses.arabic: كَذَّبَتۡ ثَمُودُ بِٱلنُّذُرِ
verses.translation: Thamud denied the warning
verses.transliteration: Kazzabat Samoodu binnuzur

verses.arabic: فَقَالُوۤا۟ أَبَشَرࣰا مِّنَّا وَ ٰ⁠حِدࣰا نَّتَّبِعُهُۥۤ إِنَّاۤ إِذࣰا لَّفِی ضَلَـٰلࣲ وَسُعُرٍ
verses.translation: And said, "Is it one human being among us that we should follow? Indeed, we would then be in error and madness.
verses.transliteration: Faqaalooo a-basharam minnaa waahidan nattabi'uhooo innaa izal lafee dalaalinw wa su'ur

verses.arabic: أَءُلۡقِیَ ٱلذِّكۡرُ عَلَیۡهِ مِنۢ بَیۡنِنَا بَلۡ هُوَ كَذَّابٌ أَشِرࣱ
verses.translation: Has the message been sent down upon him from among us? Rather, he is an insolent liar."
verses.transliteration: 'A-ulqiyaz zikru 'alaihi mim baininaa bal huwa kazzaabun ashir

verses.arabic: سَیَعۡلَمُونَ غَدࣰا مَّنِ ٱلۡكَذَّابُ ٱلۡأَشِرُ
verses.translation: They will know tomorrow who is the insolent liar.
verses.transliteration: Sa-ya'lamoona ghadam manil kazzaabul ashir

verses.arabic: إِنَّا مُرۡسِلُوا۟ ٱلنَّاقَةِ فِتۡنَةࣰ لَّهُمۡ فَٱرۡتَقِبۡهُمۡ وَٱصۡطَبِرۡ
verses.translation: Indeed, We are sending the she-camel as trial for them, so watch them and be patient.
verses.transliteration: Innaa mursilun naaqati fitnatal lahum fartaqibhum wastabir

verses.arabic: وَنَبِّئۡهُمۡ أَنَّ ٱلۡمَاۤءَ قِسۡمَةُۢ بَیۡنَهُمۡۖ كُلُّ شِرۡبࣲ مُّحۡتَضَرࣱ
verses.translation: And inform them that the water is shared between them, each [day of] drink attended [by turn].
verses.transliteration: Wa nabbi'hum annal maaa'a qismatum bainahum kullu shirbim muhtadar

verses.arabic: فَنَادَوۡا۟ صَاحِبَهُمۡ فَتَعَاطَىٰ فَعَقَرَ
verses.translation: But they called their companion, and he dared and hamstrung [her].
verses.transliteration: Fanaadaw saahibahum fata'aataa fa'aqar

verses.arabic: فَكَیۡفَ كَانَ عَذَابِی وَنُذُرِ
verses.translation: And how [severe] were My punishment and warning.
verses.transliteration: Fakaifa kaana 'azaabee wa nuzur

verses.arabic: إِنَّاۤ أَرۡسَلۡنَا عَلَیۡهِمۡ صَیۡحَةࣰ وَ ٰ⁠حِدَةࣰ فَكَانُوا۟ كَهَشِیمِ ٱلۡمُحۡتَظِرِ
verses.translation: Indeed, We sent upon them one blast from the sky, and they became like the dry twig fragments of an [animal] pen.
verses.transliteration: Innaaa arsalnaa 'alaihim saihatanw waahidatan fakaano kahasheemil muhtazir

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدۡ یَسَّرۡنَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ لِلذِّكۡرِ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرࣲ
verses.translation: And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember?
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad yassarnal quraana liz zikri fahal mim muddakir

verses.arabic: كَذَّبَتۡ قَوۡمُ لُوطِۭ بِٱلنُّذُرِ
verses.translation: The people of Lot denied the warning.
verses.transliteration: Kazzabat qawmu lootim binnuzur

verses.arabic: إِنَّاۤ أَرۡسَلۡنَا عَلَیۡهِمۡ حَاصِبًا إِلَّاۤ ءَالَ لُوطࣲۖ نَّجَّیۡنَـٰهُم بِسَحَرࣲ
verses.translation: Indeed, We sent upon them a storm of stones, except the family of Lot - We saved them before dawn
verses.transliteration: Innaa arsalnaa 'alaihim haasiban illaaa aala Loot najjainaahum bisahar

verses.arabic: نِّعۡمَةࣰ مِّنۡ عِندِنَاۚ كَذَ ٰ⁠لِكَ نَجۡزِی مَن شَكَرَ
verses.translation: As favor from us. Thus do We reward he who is grateful.
verses.transliteration: Ni'matam min 'indinaa; kazaalika najzee man shakar

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَنذَرَهُم بَطۡشَتَنَا فَتَمَارَوۡا۟ بِٱلنُّذُرِ
verses.translation: And he had already warned them of Our assault, but they disputed the warning.
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad anzarahum batshatanaa fatamaaraw binnuzur

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدۡ رَ ٰ⁠وَدُوهُ عَن ضَیۡفِهِۦ فَطَمَسۡنَاۤ أَعۡیُنَهُمۡ فَذُوقُوا۟ عَذَابِی وَنُذُرِ
verses.translation: And they had demanded from him his guests, but We obliterated their eyes, [saying], "Taste My punishment and warning."
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad raawadoohu 'andaifee fatamasnaaa a'yunahum fazooqoo 'azaabee wa nuzur

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدۡ صَبَّحَهُم بُكۡرَةً عَذَابࣱ مُّسۡتَقِرࣱّ
verses.translation: And there came upon them by morning an abiding punishment.
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad sabbahahum bukratan 'azaabum mustaqirr

verses.arabic: فَذُوقُوا۟ عَذَابِی وَنُذُرِ
verses.translation: So taste My punishment and warning.
verses.transliteration: Fazooqoo 'azaabee wa nuzur

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدۡ یَسَّرۡنَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ لِلذِّكۡرِ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرࣲ
verses.translation: And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember?
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad yassarnal Quraana liz zikri fahal mim muddakir

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدۡ جَاۤءَ ءَالَ فِرۡعَوۡنَ ٱلنُّذُرُ
verses.translation: And there certainly came to the people of Pharaoh warning.
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad jaaa'a Aala Fir'awnan nuzur

verses.arabic: كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔایَـٰتِنَا كُلِّهَا فَأَخَذۡنَـٰهُمۡ أَخۡذَ عَزِیزࣲ مُّقۡتَدِرٍ
verses.translation: They denied Our signs, all of them, so We seized them with a seizure of one Exalted in Might and Perfect in Ability.
verses.transliteration: Kazzaboo bi Aayaatinaa kullihaa fa akhaznaahum akhza 'azeezim muqtadir

verses.arabic: أَكُفَّارُكُمۡ خَیۡرࣱ مِّنۡ أُو۟لَـٰۤىِٕكُمۡ أَمۡ لَكُم بَرَاۤءَةࣱ فِی ٱلزُّبُرِ
verses.translation: Are your disbelievers better than those [former ones], or have you immunity in the scripture?
verses.transliteration: Akuffaarukum khairum min ulaaa'ikum am lakum baraaa'atun fiz Zubur

verses.arabic: أَمۡ یَقُولُونَ نَحۡنُ جَمِیعࣱ مُّنتَصِرࣱ
verses.translation: Or do they say, "We are an assembly supporting [each other]"?
verses.transliteration: Am yaqooloona nahnu jamee'um muntasir

verses.arabic: سَیُهۡزَمُ ٱلۡجَمۡعُ وَیُوَلُّونَ ٱلدُّبُرَ
verses.translation: [Their] assembly will be defeated, and they will turn their backs [in retreat].
verses.transliteration: Sa yuhzamul jam'u wa yuwalloonad dubur

verses.arabic: بَلِ ٱلسَّاعَةُ مَوۡعِدُهُمۡ وَٱلسَّاعَةُ أَدۡهَىٰ وَأَمَرُّ
verses.translation: But the Hour is their appointment [for due punishment], and the Hour is more disastrous and more bitter.
verses.transliteration: Balis Saa'atu maw'iduhum was Saa'atu adhaa wa amarr

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِینَ فِی ضَلَـٰلࣲ وَسُعُرࣲ
verses.translation: Indeed, the criminals are in error and madness.
verses.transliteration: Innal mujrimeena fee dalaalinw wa su'ur

verses.arabic: یَوۡمَ یُسۡحَبُونَ فِی ٱلنَّارِ عَلَىٰ وُجُوهِهِمۡ ذُوقُوا۟ مَسَّ سَقَرَ
verses.translation: The Day they are dragged into the Fire on their faces [it will be said], "Taste the touch of Saqar."
verses.transliteration: Yawma yushaboona fin Naari'alaa wujoohimim zooqoo massa saqar

verses.arabic: إِنَّا كُلَّ شَیۡءٍ خَلَقۡنَـٰهُ بِقَدَرࣲ
verses.translation: Indeed, all things We created with predestination.
verses.transliteration: Innaa kulla shai'in khalaqnaahu biqadar

verses.arabic: وَمَاۤ أَمۡرُنَاۤ إِلَّا وَ ٰ⁠حِدَةࣱ كَلَمۡحِۭ بِٱلۡبَصَرِ
verses.translation: And Our command is but one, like a glance of the eye.
verses.transliteration: Wa maaa amrunaaa illaa waahidatun kalamhim bilbasar

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَاۤ أَشۡیَاعَكُمۡ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرࣲ
verses.translation: And We have already destroyed your kinds, so is there any who will remember?
verses.transliteration: Wa laqad ahlaknaaa ashyaa'akum fahal mim muddakir

verses.arabic: وَكُلُّ شَیۡءࣲ فَعَلُوهُ فِی ٱلزُّبُرِ
verses.translation: And everything they did is in written records.
verses.transliteration: Wa kullu shai'in fa'aloohu fiz Zubur

verses.arabic: وَكُلُّ صَغِیرࣲ وَكَبِیرࣲ مُّسۡتَطَرٌ
verses.translation: And every small and great [thing] is inscribed.
verses.transliteration: Wa kullu sagheerinw wa kabeerim mustatar

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُتَّقِینَ فِی جَنَّـٰتࣲ وَنَهَرࣲ
verses.translation: Indeed, the righteous will be among gardens and rivers,
verses.transliteration: Innal muttaqeena fee jannaatinw wa nahar

verses.arabic: فِی مَقۡعَدِ صِدۡقٍ عِندَ مَلِیكࣲ مُّقۡتَدِرِۭ
verses.translation: In a seat of honor near a Sovereign, Perfect in Ability.
verses.transliteration: Fee maq'adi sidqin 'inda Maleekim Muqtadir
